In that way, the brain is not supplied with enough oxygen, resulting in brain damage. Therefore, if the blood is circulated through cardiopulmonary resuscitation instead of the heart, oxygen can be supplied to the brain to prevent brain damage.
This is because compressing the paralyzed heart through CPR does not stop the circulation of the body throughout the body, so oxygen can be supplied to the brain.
